channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Broken road surface, 28th October
item.description:
Road surface at junction of Sherwood Park Avenue & Harcourt Avenue broken and very deep. Riding cycle my wheels went down and very nearly got thrown in path of car. Is very dangerous for cyclists
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 240, Sherwood Park Avenue, Blendon, Sidcup, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: A bag of rubbish dumped, 28th October
item.description:
The street has been finally cleaned after two months of no street cleaning and the cleaner left a bag of rubbish on the pavement a week ago. It still has not been collected and it is almost ripped. Please remove asap. Thank you!

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Theydon Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Piss in plastic bags, 28th October
item.description:
Apologies to the poor sod who has to clear this up. We have a disgusting individual around here.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lettsom Street, Camberwell, London

item.title: Brown window dumped opposite 7 The Avenue, Beckenham, 28th October
item.description:
A window with a brown frame has been dumped on the grass verge on the south side of the Avenue, opposite a block of flats 7 The Avenue on the north side. It has since been propped up against a nearby brick wall (see photo). It has been there for at least a week. Please can it be removed - thanks!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): The Avenue, Beckenham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Middle Lantern\Column does not work - Kilburn Pl, 28th October
item.description:
Hi there, This has been reported again and apparently it is not fully resolved. The middle column light does not work which makes the street unsafe, especially now when it get dark earlier. Can you please action fix this asap?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 52-54, Kilburn High Road, Kilburn, London

item.title: There is a car parked in a parking bay that is not taxed or mot'd MINI reg MX60RWN, 28th October
item.description:
There is a car parked in a parking bay that is not taxed or mot'd MINI reg MX60RWN and you closed the previous enquiry saying it was being passed to DVLA, however DVLA say abandoned vehicles should be reported to Bexley council.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Woodlands Road, Welling, London
Report on FixMyStreet
